    • Method Detail

      • getDirectProxyFor

        <T extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.RpcService> T getDirectProxyFor(java.lang.Class<T> serviceType)
                                                                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns an instance of provided RpcService type which delegates all calls to the delegate.

        Returned instance:

        • implements provided subclass of RpcService type and org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.spi.DelegateProxy interface.

        • delegates all invocations of methods, which are defined in RpcService subtype to delegate which is defined by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.spi.DelegateProxy#setDelegate(Object).

          If delegate is not defined (getDelegate() == null) implementation throws IllegalStateException

        • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.spi.DelegateProxy#getDelegate() - returns the delegate to which all calls are delegated.
        • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.spi.DelegateProxy#setDelegate(Object) - sets the delegate for particular instance
        Parameters:
        serviceType - - Subclass of RpcService for which direct proxy is to be generated.
        Returns:
        Instance of RpcService of provided serviceType which implements and org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.spi.DelegateProxy
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getRouterFor

        <T extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.RpcService> RpcRouter<T> getRouterFor(java.lang.Class<T> serviceType,
                                                                                       java.lang.String name)
                                                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                                            RpcIsNotRoutedException
        Returns an instance of provided RpcService type which routes all calls to other instances selected on particular input field.

        Returned instance:

        • Implements:
          • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.spi.DelegateProxy
          • RpcRouter
        • routes all invocations of methods, which are defined in RpcService subtype based on method arguments and routing information defined in the RpcRoutingTables for this instance RpcRouter.getRoutingTable(Class).
          • Implementation uses RpcRouter.getService(Class, org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier) method to retrieve particular instance to which call will be routed.
          • Instance of InstanceIdentifier is determined by first argument of method and is retrieved via method which is annotated with RoutingContext. Class representing Routing Context Identifier is retrieved by a RoutingContext.
          • If first argument is not defined / RoutingContext annotation is not present on any field invocation will be delegated to default service RpcRouter.getDefaultService().
        Parameters:
        serviceType - - Subclass of RpcService for which Router is to be generated.
        Returns:
        Instance of RpcService of provided serviceType which implements also RpcRouter and org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.spi.DelegateProxy
        Throws:
        RpcIsNotRoutedException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getInvokerFactory

        NotificationInvokerFactory getInvokerFactory()
